sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
flanked by things
, ima tiste stvari na obeh straneh.

seg.quote: Billy was seated at the table, flanked by the two women.

sense.def:
Flanks
so stranski deli živalskega telesa.

seg.quote: Their legs gripped the flanks of the ponies.

sense.def:
The flank of an army or fleet
je stranski del vojske ali ladjevja, pripravljenega na boj.

seg.quote: Their fire on the enemy's flank could not stop his southward advance.
